rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a Vastu-compliant placement near the main door leading to the central courtyard.
Spacious living area adjacent to the courtyard for natural light and ventilation; includes seating arrangements and Chettinad-style decor elements.
Adjacent to the living room and designed for family meals with a view of the garden.
Luxurious master bedroom located in the southeast direction following Vastu principles, ensuring tranquility and energy flow. Includes an ensuite bathroom.
Additional bedroom designed for family members, placed with a clear view of the garden and natural lighting.
A dedicated child room following Vastu guidelines for positive energy and peaceful sleep.
Entertainment area with soundproofing and comfortable seating; integrated within the villa layout to encourage family bonding.
Functional kitchen located adjacent to the dining area ensuring efficient workflow. Incorporates Chettinad motifs and local design elements.
Ensuite bathroom for the master bedroom with modern fixtures and Vastu compliant positioning.
Additional storage/utility area, ensuring compliance with local building norms.

openings.description: Main entry following Vastu guidelines, ensuring auspicious entrance to the villa.
Window in living area opening to the garden for natural light and ventilation.
Opening that leads to the central courtyard ensuring connectivity between spaces.
